text: future for all in Tower Hamlets. We have a unique opportunity to build a vibrant and successful future for Tower Hamlets that benefits all residents, regardless of background or circumstances. With the production of this new Local Plan, we are taking the lead in ensuring that we build our Borough to benefit present and future generations. Together, we can make Tower Hamlets a place where everyone can thrive. Tower Hamlets Local Plan 5 FOREWORD মেয়রের ভূমিকা
